review: Lovely plot and content. I am in love with each and every one of them. One of the reasons I started getting more into anime :) totally recommend if you're a big fan of anime or not ! It's for everyone I swear !

title: Loved it
review: No words. I'm not one for cartoon movies but this honestly made me cry thinking of my family. Would totally rewatch and recommend ! Be sure to get the tissues out if you're sensitive :')
